department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: "This course aims to equip students with the following abilities: being able to think about research critically being able to conduct experiments with reliability and validity being able to collaborate with colleagues being knowledgeable in psychophysics and signal detection theory Emphasis will be placed on: (1) fundamental principles of experimental design (2) essential knowledge/skills of data acquisition, analysis, and interpretation (3) clear writing and critical reading of research reports (4) collaboration with colleagues It is expected that with these abilities students will appreciate how to explore human behavior and mental activities in a scientific way. In addition to lectures and discussions, students will get hand-on research experience by completing research projects."

content.en:
"1. Each week we will focus on a specific topic associated with a set of assigned readings. The readings should be completed before the class.
2. Assignments (including critiques of research papers) will be given regularly and should be completed before the due dates.
3. You will be divided into groups to complete a research project. A research topic should be chosen before the end of March. Literature review and experimental design should be completed before the end of April and you will make a proposal report in the class. Run the experiment in May with at least 8 participants. Poster presentations of your project will be arranged in June. In addition, you should write a research report (term-paper) based on the project."
